\[%mdk-data-line={73}
f_\text{lsc}(y) = \sup_{H \ni y \text{ open}} \qty[\inf_{z \in H} f(z)]
\ge \inf_{z \in G} f(z) > c.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[4202025ca33a0244467654fcec511b07]%mdk
$x \in X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

$x$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

$f^{-1}((c, \infty]).$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[9d8aaaba01f3f1f000818ae055bb6e07]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={90}
f_\text{lsc}(x) = \sup_{H \ni x \text{ open}} \qty[\inf_{y \in H} f(y)]
\ge \inf_{y \in G} f(y) \ge c.
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={93}
